value.title: Building a Virtual Relationship in Power BI   Basics of TREATAS DAX Function
value.excerpt: TreatAs is an interesting function with multiple use cases in Power BI. value.title: Currency Exchange Rate Converter Power BI Function   Part 1
value.excerpt: If you ever need to convert amounts from one currency to another, you face the challenge that currency rates are not constant. They change every day.
